name: BRITISH AIRWAYS FIRST CLASS FLIGHT, A380 - London Heathrow to San Francisco. The trip report!
description:
WATCH: AZUMA: Britainâ€™s NEW high speed train: https://youtu.be/Y8ti6V73F0c

Fancy being a Patron? https://www.patreon.com/paulstripreports

In this video, I take a flight on British Airways' Airbus A380 between London Heathrow and San Francisco in First Class. A marvellous trip! The video includes every single aspect of the trip from arriving at Heathrow to landing at San Francisco on a crisp winter evening. Highlights include the Concorde Room at Heathrow, private cabana tour, dining in the lounge, all the inflight service as well as spectacular views of northern Canada and the Rockies. 

Please do SUBSCRIBE and leave me a comment! Thank you for watching - I love to read what you all write.
